## Color4.FromArray() method

Creates a new Color4 from the starting index element of the given array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromArray(array: ArrayLike<number>, offset?: number): Color4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | defines the source array to read from |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | defines the offset in the source array |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color4`

a new Color4 object
